title: Web-Based English Vocabulary Learning Design Project for Visually Impaired University Students

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level English vocabulary and experience with web-based assistive technology (WAT)
context.additional_context: A learning environment focused on acquiring English terminology in mathematics for visually impaired professionals

learning_goals: Learners acquire and utilize over 500 English vocabulary terms in mathematics within six months using web-based assistive technology (WAT).
Achieve over 90% accuracy in vocabulary meaning through a voice feedback system and braille conversion functionality
Design and present vocabulary usage applicable to real-world work scenarios through PBL team activities

resources: Mathematics Field English Terminology Dictionary Database

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
